title: Modest Aspirations
description: Modest Aspirations brings small press veteran, Gerald Locklin, and newcomer Beth Wilson together in this new collection of poems and short stories. Fans of Locklin's poems will not be disappointed by these "new poems" -- he is at the top of his game here. And complimenting the poems are eight short stories by Beth Wilson. They have never been published before, so this is Wilson's debut.
author: Gerald Locklin
